title: Version 2.0.70 Release with 13 CLI Improvements
description: Major CLI release with Enter key functionality for prompt submission, MCP tool enhancements with wildcard syntax, and UX improvements including auto-update toggle for plugin marketplaces.

community_feedback.quote: Strong community engagement with 437 votes and 126 comments on release announcement
Users appreciate Enter key functionality improvement and MCP wildcard syntax support

title: C++ Code Editing Tools in Public Preview
description: C++ code editing tools for GitHub Copilot now available in public preview, integrated in Visual Studio 2026 Insiders release with enhanced code completion and debugging capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: Major step forward for C++ developers using AI-assisted coding

title: Version 2.2 with Debug Mode and Visual Editor
description: Major release featuring AI-powered Debug Mode, revolutionary Visual Editor for frontend development, Multi-Agent Judging system, Plan Mode improvements, and Pinned Chats functionality.

community_feedback.quote: Visual Editor is revolutionary for frontend development
Some users experiencing bugs with ever-changing UI
Debug Mode significantly speeds up troubleshooting workflow
